alert.note: Alert for Acadia; Allen; Calcasieu; East Cameron; Evangeline; Jefferson Davis; St. Landry; Vermilion (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 18 at 2:15PM CST by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Cameron, Jefferson Davis, Evangeline, Acadia, southeastern Calcasieu, northwestern Vermilion, western St. Landry and eastern Allen Parishes through 300 PM CST... At 214 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Allen Parish Airport to Holmwood. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Opelousas, Crowley, Eunice, Jennings, Rayne, Oakdale, Ville Platte, Church Point, Mamou, Welsh, Iowa, Lake Arthur, Kinder, Basile, Oberlin, Iota, Gueydan, Elton, Mermentau and Fenton. This includes the following highways... Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 39 and 88. Interstate 49 between mile markers 28 and 37. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.

area.areaDesc: Acadia; Allen; Calcasieu; East Cameron; Evangeline; Jefferson Davis; St. Landry; Vermilion
